title: I'm a Shopping Editor, and I Can't Resist These Sephora Cyber Monday Deals
description: Thanksgiving and Black Friday are over, but sales don't stop. Cyber Monday is here, and the beauty deals are still going strong. Right now, you can still score plenty of discounts on all things beauty at Sephora. Now is the perfect time to stock up on skin care, makeup, hair care, body care, nail care, and more at incredible price cuts. You can even get a head start on gift shopping. We curated a list of the best Cyber Monday Sephora deals you can shop right now, including markdowns on holiday gift sets. Looking for a new hair tool? Score deals up to 30 percent off on bestselling gadgets from Shark Beauty and Dyson. We also found deals on brands like Rare Beauty, Khiel's, Briogeo, and Glossier. Our Favorite Cyber Monday Sephora Deals to Shop A lip balm restock: Glossier Limited Edition Biscotti and Espresso Balm Dotcom Duo at $22, originally $27. A set of hydrating lip oils: Innbeauty Project Glaze For Days Lip Oil Holiday Kit at $39, originally $49. A gift set for the skin-care lover: Kiehl's Since 1851 Keeping Up With Kiehl's Holiday Vault Set at $74, originally $98. Hydrating undereye patches: Peter Thomas Roth Eyes In The Sky 3-Piece Kit at $60, originally $85. A hair tool that can do it all: Dyson Special Edition Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long in Strawberry Bronze at $499, originally $599. Stock up on your favorites, try something new, or shop for the beauty lover on your list. Keep reading to shop our top deals. Shop more of PS's Cyber Monday deals and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations.

Thanksgiving and Black Friday are over, but sales don't stop. Cyber Monday is here, and the beauty deals are still going strong. Right now, you can still score plenty of discounts on all things beauty at Sephora. Now is the perfect time to stock up on skin care, makeup, hair care, body care, nail care, and more at incredible price cuts. You can even get a head start on gift shopping.

We curated a list of the best Cyber Monday Sephora deals you can shop right now, including markdowns on holiday gift sets. Looking for a new hair tool? Score deals up to 30 percent off on bestselling gadgets from Shark Beauty and Dyson. We also found deals on brands like Rare Beauty, Khiel's, Briogeo, and Glossier.

Our Favorite Cyber Monday Sephora Deals to Shop

  • A lip balm restock: Glossier Limited Edition Biscotti and Espresso Balm Dotcom Duo at $22, originally $27.
  • A set of hydrating lip oils: Innbeauty Project Glaze For Days Lip Oil Holiday Kit at $39, originally $49.
  • A gift set for the skin-care lover: Kiehl's Since 1851 Keeping Up With Kiehl's Holiday Vault Set at $74, originally $98.
  • Hydrating undereye patches: Peter Thomas Roth Eyes In The Sky 3-Piece Kit at $60, originally $85.
  • A hair tool that can do it all: Dyson Special Edition Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long in Strawberry Bronze at $499, originally $599.

Stock up on your favorites, try something new, or shop for the beauty lover on your list. Keep reading to shop our top deals.

Update on December 2, 2024 at 1:45 p.m. ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.

Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Cyber Monday deals and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations.

Best Sephora Deal on a Liquid Eyeliner

Urban Decay 24/7 Inks Easy Ergonomic Liquid Eyeliner Pen ($14, originally $28)

Need to stock up on eyeliner? This pigmented liquid liner is half off at Sephora. The waterproof formula is smudge- and fade-proof, and the felt tip allows for a precise application. It comes in nine colors.

Best Sephora Deal on a Hydrating Lip Balm

Glow Recipe Plum Plump Hyaluronic Acid Lip Gloss Balm ($15, originally $22)

This glossy balm will give your lips long-lasting hydration, and it's only $15 at Sephora during the retailer's Cyber Week sale. Formulated with hyaluronic acid, it has a nonsticky feel and delivers a high-shine finish.

Best Sephora Deal on a Tinted Lip Product

Clinique Almost Lipstick ($18, originally $25)

If you're wondering if Clinique's Almost Lipstick is worth the hype, you can score it on sale right now and try it out. This universally flattering sheer tinted lip product delivers a hydrating feel and a "my lips but better" look.

Best Sephora Deal on a Lip Liner

Refy Lip Sculpt ($21, originally $26)

Refy's innovative Lip Sculpt is on sale, and you can achieve a long-lasting, defined lip with this product. The dual-ended lippie has a lip liner on one end and a clear, setting formula that sets your liner in place. It comes in pink and neutral-toned shades.

Best Sephora Deal on Hair Oil

Olaplex No. 7 Bonding Oil ($21)

If you haven't already added a hair oil into your hair-care routine, it's time to get on that ASAP. Our pick? The Olaplex No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protectant Hair Oil. Not only does it smell delicious, but it's made for all hair types and textures. It protects against damage as well as hot tools, and it will help tame even the frizziest of styles.

Best Sephora Deal on a Shower Oil

L'Occitane Cleansing And Softening Shower Oil With Almond Oil ($23, originally $29)

Give yourself a luxurious moment in the shower with L'Occitane's Almond Shower Oil while it's on sale. The soothing and luxe formula starts as an oil and transforms into a delicate, milky lotion that cleanses and nourishes the body when it comes in contact with water. Plus, it smells like warm almonds and vanilla. Read our review of the L'occitane Cleansing & Softening Almond Shower Oil for more.

Editor Quote: "Being able to use the two-in-one product in lieu of a post-cleansing lotion has completely streamlined my body-care routine. I no longer have to set aside time to spritz on body oil, wait for it to dry, and then follow up with a lotion. The L'Occitane Cleansing & Softening Almond Shower Oil takes care of all these steps for me with its deeply moisturizing ingredients. Plus, the freshly baked Parisian-almond croissant aroma pleasantly lingers on my skin for up to an hour." - Natasha Marsh, contributing editor

Best Sephora Deal on a Body Lotion

Ole Henriksen BeamCream Smoothing Body Moisturizer ($23, originally $38)

Ole Henriksen's BeamCream Smoothing Body Moisturizer is a hydrating and exfoliating lotion worth stocking up on during the colder months. The AHAs gently smooth out and brighten your skin while deeply conditioning the skin.

Best Sephora Deal on a Moisturizer

First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream Intense Hydration - Value Size ($24, originally $48)

The bestselling First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream Intense Hydration is currently half off and it's worth stocking up on for all your dry skin needs this winter. This rich moisturizer infuses hydration into the skin and soothes the skin with colloidal oatmeal without feeling heavy.

Best Sephora Deal on a Hair Mask

Fable & Mane HoliRoots Repairing Hair Mask ($25, originally $36)

Revive dry ends with this intensive moisturizing hair mask from Fable & Mane. Formulated with coconut cream, mango butter, and banana, this will transform your hair into a silky, smooth texture that shines and looks healthy.

Best Sephora Deal on a Blush Set

Rare Beauty Mini Blush and Luminize Trio ($25, originally $35)

The Rare Beauty Mini Blush and Luminize Trio is the perfect stocking stuffer for the makeup lover in your life, and you can snag a few while it's $10 off. It comes with two of the brand's bestselling blush shades and a luminizer for a natural-looking, radiant flush of color.

Best Sephora Deal on a Primer

Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Gripping Primer ($25, originally $38)

The Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Gripping Primer is a bestseller for a reason, and it's 34 percent off right now. Its hydrating formula gives your skin the perfect base for any foundation to stay put, while being flexible and skin-like.

Best Sephora Deal on a Dark Spot Serum

Topicals Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration ($27, originally $38)

Dealing with dark spots? The bestselling Topicals Faded Serum is on sale and it's the perfect time to stock up. Formulated with tranexamic acid, niacinamide, azelaic acid, and kojic acid, this serum will deliver a brighter, more even skin tone with consistent use.

Best Sephora Deal on a Matte Foundation

Make Up For Ever HD Skin Waterproof Natural Matte Foundation ($33, originally $47)

With a skin-like natural matte finish, the Make Up For Ever HD Skin Foundation blurs the look of imperfections for a flawless base. It's great for oily, combination, and normal skin types. Get it on sale for less than $40.

Best Sephora Deal on a Cool-Toned Eyeshadow Palette

Natasha Denona My Dream Eyeshadow Palette ($35, originally $69)

If you're looking for a cool-toned pink palette for romantic looks, this one from Natasha Denona is on a major markdown. At nearly half off, it's rare to see a Natasha Denona palette go on sale. This is also a great gift for the makeup lover in your life.

Best Sephora Deal on Foundation

Nars Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation ($36, originally $52)

The Nars Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation delivers a long-lasting wear without the dryness. It is buildable and gives you 16 hours of fade-resistant wear. It's the perfect time to stock up on this foundation while it's on sale.

Best Sephora Deal on a Warm-Toned Eyeshadow Palette

Too Faced Better Than Chocolate Eyeshadow Palette ($38, originally $54)

Whether you're shopping for a makeup lover or just looking to treat yourself, snag the Too Faced Better Than Chocolate Eyeshadow Palette on sale right now. You can create an array of colorful looks, keep it neutral, or go glam with shimmers.

Best Sephora Deal on a Lip Oil Set

Innbeauty Project Glaze For Days Lip Oil Holiday Kit ($39, originally $49)

Get four shades of Innbeauty Project's bestselling hydrating, high-shine lip oils with this holiday kit that's $10 off. The shades deliver a wash of color along with a fun scent. You can also get it as a gift for the beauty lover in your life.

Best Sephora Deal on a Vitamin C Serum

Youth To The People 15% Vitamin C + Caffeine Energy Brightening Serum ($50, originally $72)

A good vitamin C serum will brighten your complexion and fade dark spots, and this one from Youth To The People is an affordable option that we love. It's formulated with a 15 percent vitamin C and caffeine that helps target hyperpigmentation and brighten overall dullness.

Best Sephora Deal on a Sensitive Skin Gift Set

Skinfix The Barrier Bundle Hydrating + Plumping Trio ($52, originally $69)

Skinfix is a great brand to shop if you have sensitive skin. This bundle of skin barrier-nourishing products will help hydrate and calm your skin, especially with winter dryness. This set comes with the brand's bestselling Triple Lipid-Peptide Refillable Cream and travel sizes of a gentle cleanser and niacinamide serum. It's a great gift for the skin-care lover in your life, too.

Best Sephora Deal on a Lipstick

Tom Ford Ultra Shine Lip Color ($53, originally $62)

Available on sale in six shades, the Tom Ford Ultra Shine Lip Color is a luxe find you can treat yourself to for the holiday season. It's a hydrating pigmented formula that feels lightweight and delivers a high-shine finish.

Best Sephora Deal on Eye Patches

Peter Thomas Roth Eyes In The Sky 3-Piece Kit ($60, originally $85)

If undereye patches are a core part of your getting-ready routine, this full size set from Peter Thomas Roth is a must. It comes with three types of hydra-gel eye patches for hydration, firming, and brightening. Each container comes with 60 patches so you'll get 180 in total — a steal!

Best Sephora Deal on Shark Hair Tools

Shark Beauty SmoothStyle Heated Comb + Blow Dryer Brush ($69, originally $99)

This blow dryer brush has a built-in heated comb that delivers smoothing effects without the hair becoming flat. You can use the blow dryer brush mode on wet and dry hair, while the heated comb mode is ideal for styling and touch-ups. If you rely on blow dryer brushes for your styling needs, this tool is all you need, and it's $30 off.

You can also consider getting the Shark Beauty Wicked x Shark FlexStyle ($229, originally $299) if you want a multi-styler hair tool that can do it all.

Best Sephora Deal on a Body Moisturizer

Sol de Janeiro Biggie Biggie Bum Bum Cream ($72, originally $85)

If you're obsessed with the tropical scent of Sol de Janeiro's Bum Bum Cream, the value size tub is currently on sale. This tub has a surfboard-shaped spatula to help you scoop out every last bit. You'll feel like you're on vacation all winter long.

Best Sephora Deal on Glossier Perfume

Glossier You Eau de Parfum Set ($80, originally $94)

Glossier's You perfume is a bestseller that makes for a perfect gift for the holidays, and it's on sale. This woody and earthy scent is unisex and layerable. It's warm and familiar but smells unique on everyone's skin.
